contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of March 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal in the above matters is GRANTED. The
Superior Court Order is VACATED and the matters are REMANDED to the Superior Court for reconsideration in a manner consistent with Commonwealth v.Cruttenden, 619 Pa. 123, 58 A.3d 95 (2012).
